subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored the tying goal in the third period and then won it with a brilliant effort 3 minutes 44 seconds into overtime as the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the host Islanders, 3-2.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored the tying goal in the third period and then won it with a brilliant effort 3 minutes 44 seconds into overtime as the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the host Islanders, 3-2.
